## Oznoe and Wind simple linear regression


```{r air}
data("airquality")
head(airquality)
fit = lm(Ozone~Wind,data = airquality)
summary(fit)
```
## Plot

```{r airplot}
x = airquality$Wind
y = airquality$Ozone
plot(x,y)
abline(fit, col="red")
